content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment and check the version using execute_shell, but all attempts resulted in a "No such file or directory" error. I tried multiple paths, including /opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/anaconda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, and /home/atlas/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, but all returned the same error. I also tried activating the environment using ~/miniconda3/bin/activate, but it returned a "No such file or directory" error as well. All attempts to check the version using execute_shell returned an empty result. I received a message to execute the shell with a specific command to activate the environment and check the version, but it returned a "No such file or directory" error for the miniconda3/bin/activate path.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /root/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
